content: my very first cowl pattern dedicated to jess roth my wonderful wonderful friend a big thank you to my testers tania barry julie jules and my editor sam bennett <3 this is a very simple pattern with a gorgeous texture from the crossed stitches used any yarn can be used the cowl can be made to any size i hope you enjoy it x for help with the pattern or to share your work please join my group https //www facebook com/groups/crochetwenchdesigns tags #crochetwench #littlestoriescowl my facebook page https //www facebook com/thecrochetwench/ my instagram https //www instagram com/wobbs1/ australian crochet community group https //www facebook com/groups/australiancrochetcommunity/
